## ScrollbarPair.setY() method

Set the handle of the vertical scrollbar to be at a certain position in CSS pixels relative to its parents.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setY(y: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  y | number | Vertical scroll value. |

**Returns:**

void
